name: GWJ#49: University Life
description:
In this game you are trying to balance and stack different aspects of your university life and get as high as you can.

Different aspects have different shapes and can be tricky to stack, while easily falling.

Instructions:

WASD: moves camera around

Left click: show item to be placed. Click again to place the item

Right click: cancel clicking item

Q E: rotates item

Mouse wheel: zoom camera in/out 

1 2 3 4: choose items to be placed

~: restart game

Spacebar: pause game
